subject: Tennis
lead_paragraph: John McEnroe has offered to help Roger Federer rediscover his form after Federer sustained a series of uncharacteristic losses this year. Federer, who is one shy of Pete Sampras’s career Grand Slam title record of 14, has failed to win a tournament or beat any of his rivals ranked in the world’s top four. After the second-ranked Federer lost to Serbia’s Novak Djokovic on Friday in the Sony Ericsson Open, McEnroe said he was willing to help.
